alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 1:28AM MST until November 17 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Beartooth Foothills. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST early this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from Midnight tonight to 10 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick roads and areas of poor visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
